Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. M. Kamal Uddin at CSCR Hospital, Chittagong is 6pm to 10pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Nasir Uddin
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Nasir Uddin obtained his MBBS degree from Rangpur Medical College on 2008. He completed Master of Surgery (MS) in Neurosurgery from Dhaka Medical College (DMC) under Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU), Dhaka. Prior to joining Evercare Hospital Chattogram he worked as an Assistant Professor of Neurosurgery at BIHS General Hospital, Dhaka. He also worked in Neurosurgery department at BRB Hospitals Ltd Dhaka, Apollo Hospitals Dhaka, Ibn Sina Hospital Dhaka, Khwaja Yunus Ali Medical College Hospital Sirajganj in various position.
